gridSubtitle.markdown: Learn more about my journey and want motivates me.

content.markdown: Ever since I was a child, I had a passion for numbers and data, which led me to start a small family bank where I acted as the "bank manager" and the rest of the family members were my "customers". This experience ignited my interest in the world of finance, business, and analytics, which has continued to grow throughout my career.

columns.title: Why did you get into data science?

content.markdown: I'm someone who loves to stay active, so I often engage in outdoor activities like hiking, biking, gardening, and camping. When I'm not outside, I enjoy reading, watching TV shows, or going to the gym. I also like to explore new places, try out new restaurants and cuisines, and spend time with my friends and family.

columns.title: What do you like to do in your free time?

content.markdown: I have always wanted to travel to Italy. My name, "Jiannina" is actually an Italian name. I have heard so many good things about the culture, food, and scenery. My goal is to visit a small town, rent a scooter, and live like a local for a few days.

columns.title: Where would you like to travel?

content.markdown: Jiannina is a professional, very organized, and willing to have the best results in her task. She has a great ability to carry out projects where deadlines and good communication are indispensable. It has been a pleasure to work with her.

subtitle.markdown: Welcome to the Marketing Website reference app, powered by GraphCMS. This is an open-sourced website to learn how to build modern websites with a Headless CMS.

marketing.content: Need A Data Scientist? I Am Currently Open To Work.

seo.description: Learn how to build modern marketing websites, with localization and SEO, using GraphCMS, NextJS, Chakra, and Vercel.
seo.title: Build Modern Marketing Websites with a Headless CMS
